title: Homeland Security Issues Warning on Possible Trucker Protest
sub_head: Agency tells police forces to prepare for Covid-19 protest convoy forming in L.A. on Super Bowl Sunday and bound for Washington
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”The U.S. Department of Homeland Security is warning law-enforcement officials that a convoy of truckers protesting Covid-19 vaccination mandates could make its way across the U.S., potentially blocking roads in several major cities and disrupting Super Bowl Sunday in Los Angeles.
The department said in a Tuesday bulletin to state and local authorities that the convoy could form on Sunday in Inglewood, Calif., where the Super Bowl will be played on Sunday, and travel to Washington, where President Biden is giving his State of the Union address on March 1, adding truckers along the way.
